DSProc¶

Design Space Processor

autodse.dsproc.dsproc.analyze_child_in_design_space(params: Dict[str, autodse.parameter.DesignParameter]) → None¶

Traverse design parameter dependency and build child list for each parameter in place.

Parameters

params -- The overall design space

autodse.dsproc.dsproc.check_design_space(params: Dict[str, autodse.parameter.DesignParameter]) → int¶

Check design space for missing dependency and duplication.

Parameters

params -- The overall design space.

Returns

The number of errors found in the design space.

autodse.dsproc.dsproc.compile_design_space(user_ds_config: Dict[str, Dict[str, Union[str, int]]], scope_map: Optional[Dict[str, List[str]]]) → Optional[Dict[str, autodse.parameter.DesignParameter]]¶

Compile the design space from the config JSON file.

Parameters

  • user_ds_config -- The input design space configure loaded from a JSON file. Note that the duplicated ID checking should be done when loading the JSON file and here we assume no duplications.

  • scope_map -- The scope map that maps design parameter ID to its scope.

Returns

The design space compiled from the kernel code; or None if failed.

autodse.dsproc.dsproc.count_design_points(ds: Dict[str, autodse.parameter.DesignParameter]) → int¶

Count the valid points in a given design space.

Parameters

ds -- Design space to be counted.

Returns

Number of valid design points.

autodse.dsproc.dsproc.get_dsproc_logger() → logging.Logger¶

Attach the logger of this module

autodse.dsproc.dsproc.partition(space: Dict[str, autodse.parameter.DesignParameter], limit: int) → Optional[List[Dict[str, autodse.parameter.DesignParameter]]]¶

Partition the given design space to at most the limit parts.

Parameters

  • space -- The design space to be partitioned.

  • limit -- The maximum number of partitions.

Returns

The list of design space partitions.

autodse.dsproc.dsproc.topo_sort_param_ids(space: Dict[str, autodse.parameter.DesignParameter]) → List[str]¶

Sort the parameter IDs topologically.

Parameters

space -- The design space to be sorted.

Returns

The sorted IDs.
